org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Class Upgrade

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.upgrade.Upgrade

  • public final class Upgrade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the table of upgrade tasks that need performing when upgrading from one version to another.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EXIT_CODE_ERROR
      The error exit code value.
      static int EXIT_CODE_MANUAL_INTERVENTION
      The exit code value that will be used if upgrade requires manual intervention.
      static int EXIT_CODE_SUCCESS
      The success exit code value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<UpgradeTask> getUpgradeTasks(BuildVersion fromVersion, BuildVersion toVersion)
      Returns a list containing all the tasks which are required in order to upgrade from fromVersion to toVersion.
      static void upgrade(UpgradeContext context)
      Upgrades the server from fromVersion to toVersion located in the upgrade context.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getUpgradeTasks

        public static java.util.List<UpgradeTask> getUpgradeTasks(BuildVersion fromVersion,
                                          BuildVersion toVersion)
        Returns a list containing all the tasks which are required in order to upgrade from fromVersion to toVersion.
        Parameters:
        fromVersion - The old version.
        toVersion - The new version.
        Returns:
        A list containing all the tasks which are required in order to upgrade from fromVersion to toVersion.

      • upgrade

        public static void upgrade(UpgradeContext context)
                    throws ClientException
        Upgrades the server from fromVersion to toVersion located in the upgrade context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the upgrade.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If an error occurred while performing the upgrade.
